about_the_game:
All sales go towards the Wounded Warrior Project and Feast of Crispian.

In this charity scene, the cast performs a staged reading for the press and for charity. You have a chance to boost stats in all categories.

The content will add itself to the base game automatically.

About Wounded Warrior Project


Wounded Warrior Project is a charity and veterans service organization that offers a variety of programs, services and events for wounded veterans of the military.

About Feast of Crispian

It is a non-profit organization that brings professional actors and veterans together to strengthen the emotional resources they need to overcome trauma and reintegration issues.
